name: Generation Next
desc: If your LP are lower than your opponent's: Take 1 "Elemental HERO" monster, "Kuriboh" monster, or "Neo-Spacian" monster from your Deck or GY, whose ATK is less than or equal to the difference between your LP and your opponent's, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Generation Next" per turn.
